Articles.Content:
Hi!

I just bought the game, downloaded the demo tried it out (at work even!) and bought the game ten minutes later.

Now I have it sitting on my laptop next to my work computer but can't play it! Maybe I'll dare to start it up during the midday break!

I managed to crash three rockets (twice killing my kerbonauts) and send one into the stratosphere in the demo though so I am content.

Welcome! Playing KSP when you're not really supposed to makes the game a whole lot more enjoyable. If you need any pointers, remember, the community is your friend! Enjoy the endless fun of slaughtering the many Kerbals to come in your KSP future; but remember, it is all for science.

Hi technotica, welcome to the community

Ohhhh naughty, don't let your boss see you, unless you are the boss, then don't let your minions see you
